actions.recommendation: Take a good multivitamin such as Phytomulti with active B vitamins in it to help reduce homocysteine level from 11.8umol/l to around 8umol/l.

Continue with your healthy high fiber diet, probiotics, exercise and adequate water intake to encourage a daily bowel movement. As you are still only going every second day I recommend supplementing with magnesium citrate starting at 300mg and Vit C 1000mg at night to have a gentle natural laxative effect.
Continue to manage your stress through your healthy diet and exercise regime. Consider adding some deep breathing exercises or meditation.
Supplement with vit D3 5000iu daily. Aim to increase level from 25ng/ml to between 50 to 80ng/ml. Repeat level in 4 to 6 months. If level is optimal then can reduce dosage to 1000iu daily.
